scripts.posttest: npm run check-coverage && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run build-es5
scripts.build-es5: npm run mkdir-dist && npm run regenerator && npm run browserify-es5 && npm run minify-es5
scripts.browserify-es5: regenerator --include-runtime polyfill.js > jsonata-es5.js; browserify dist/jsonata.js --standalone jsonata >> jsonata-es5.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run build-es5
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
